title: Someone ease my fears!
body:
Yorick looks amazing! and as a bass player i will be addicted to pentakill Yorick, 

but someone please tell me that he isn't going to be just Malzahar 2.0

Having 1 champion with a living, moving, line of skillshot blockers that crowds around you and attacks for them is enough..

replies.body: Oh you're a bass player too huh. Cool :^)

You too? Gotta love the bass :P

The pentakill Yorick skin tho... I'm gunna have to play Yorick now xD

His fingers are even animated in his dance too haha so good.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=thAcXFIT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-24T02:21:38.319+0000)
>
> You too? Gotta love the bass :P
> 
> The pentakill Yorick skin tho... I'm gunna have to play Yorick now xD
> 
> His fingers are even animated in his dance too haha so good.

Indeed :^)

Yeah i will give him a crack for sure.
He's always had ghouls, they're just better now. Also, don't forget about Elise  and her spider army when she's in spider form.

Ahh but her Spiders are usually behind her, and when she auto attacks you, she has to be in melee range, not standing behind a living wall. 

and Yorick's old minions usually went in one at a time, and died very easily.

Malz's minions just crowd around the front half of your champion blocking any skillshots you throw at him, BUT the minions are tanky enough not to be killed by a single skillshot.

Champs like Ryze are rendered useless.

I have a bass too, and sometimes I even play it (I mostly play guitar).

As for the Malz 2.0 thing, isn't it a case of 1 AP and 1 AD? Idk, just guessing as I haven't played or seen ingame new Yorick.
